name: Featherweight Foam
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Hydro Hilichurl Rogue, equip this card.
After Hydro Hilichurl Rogue equips this card, immediately use Slash of Surging Tides once.
When your Hydro Hilichurl Rogue, who has this card equipped, is on the field, spend 1 less Elemental Die when using a Technique. (Once per Round)
(You must have Hydro Hilichurl Rogue in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2205]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2205] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S22052]</color> once.
When your $[A2205], who has this card equipped, is on the field, spend 1 less Elemental Die when using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A2205] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Hilichurl Rogue</color>, equip this card.
After Hydro Hilichurl Rogue equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Slash of Surging Tides</color> once.
When your Hydro Hilichurl Rogue, who has this card equipped, is on the field, spend 1 less Elemental Die when using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique. (Once per Round)
(You must have Hydro Hilichurl Rogue in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Hydro Hilichurl Rogue at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
